list_definition.definition: a piece of cloth, plastic etc worn over the front of the clothes for protection against dirt etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She tied on her apron before preparing the dinner.

list_definition.definition: something like an apron in shape, eg a hard surface for aircraft on an airfield.
(also apron-stage) the part of the stage in a theatre which is in front of the curtain.
